title: Page
description: Even after a year, some of the pages still don't think a girl should be training as a knight. For a time it seems they will try anything - insult, trick, brawl - to get Keladry thrown out.But then the bullying stops and Kel hopes she can concentrate on honing her warrior skills. Test-day will be the most important in her life. And it's the perfect moment for those who loathe her to strike...
author: Tamora Pierce
